meanings.definition: A group of chemical compounds derived from aniline and used in the production of pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study acetanilids to create new medicines.
meanings.sent2: The acetanilids are essential for making many types of drugs.
meanings.sent3: The acetanilids in the lab were having a party, celebrating their role in medicine.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like acetanilids, forming the foundation for groundbreaking treatments.
meanings.sent5: The acetanilids shimmered under the microscope, revealing their intricate structure.

meanings.definition: A type of pain reliever commonly used in over-the-counter medications.
meanings.sent1: When I have a headache, I take acetanilids for relief.
meanings.sent2: Acetanilids can be found in many painkillers at the pharmacy.
meanings.sent3: The acetanilids in the pill danced their way to soothe the pain.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted like acetanilids, easing the discomfort in the room.
meanings.sent5: The acetanilids swiftly calmed the throbbing ache, bringing comfort.
